## cybr platforms get

Get a specific platform

### Synopsis

Get a specific platform from PAS REST API.
	
	Example Usage:
	$ cybr platforms get -i WinDomain

```
cybr platforms get [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                 help for get
  -i, --platform-id string   Platform ID to list from
```
